        Get the cache region to use.

      • getFetchSize

        public int getFetchSize()
        Get the fetch size.
        Returns:
        the fetch size. If 0, disabled.

      • isAllowInvalidColumnAccess

        public boolean isAllowInvalidColumnAccess()
        Get the allow invalid column access flag.
        Returns:
        the allow invalid column access flag.

      • setAllowInvalidColumnAccess

        public void setAllowInvalidColumnAccess(boolean allowInvalidColumnAccess)
        Set the allow invalid column access flag.

        By default, implementations of QLResolver that support this will throw an exception if results are accessed by column name and the column name doesn't exist in the results.

        Defaults to false.
        Parameters:
        allowInvalidColumnAccess - the allow invalid column access flag.

      • setCacheRegion

        public void setCacheRegion(String cacheRegion)
        Set the optional cache region. If set to a non blank value, then query caching will be enabled when possible.
        Parameters:
        cacheRegion - the cache region. May be null.

      • setFetchSize

        public void setFetchSize(int fetchSize)
        Set the fetch size. Set to 0 to disable - the default.
        Parameters:
        fetchSize - the fetch size.
